answers.answer: If its only the 1 hour glucose test then you dont have to fast, but if its the 3 hour it could mess up the results

Omg 3:30? That's a long time! I was told not to eat after midnight but I could go in as early as 730 if I wanted. Idk if you should eat or not but the earlier the better most likely so you can fast right before your test. I'd call the doc n see or tell them what time you ate when you go in. Good luck!
They gave me a paper and it said I was allowed to eat toast dry. Lol like that is going to do any good for me lol
I know its Farr away lol but okay thanks :)

question: This may be stupid but I have my diabetes test today at 3:30 and its only 10:16 in the morning im soo hungry lol I cam eat a sausage biscuit from mc donalds right ? Lol
